Text: ah it's coming along now.. thanks so much!

No, they shouldn't show you.  If they showed everyone who uploadeded crap how they caught it, they would just be teaching people how to hide crap more effectively.  Not to mention wasting a huge amount of time because even if they do make mistakes sometimes (and I've no idea whether this is one of them or not), MOST people they catch are genuine scumbags.  Obviously, since they haven't banned you, they've given you the benefit of the doubt and just removed a couple of suspicious torrents out of hundreds you have.  No...big...deal.

You've massively over-reacted.  How many times have you replied to yourself now?   And by pissing on innocent downloaders you've proven to everyone that you're not worthy of a skull.  They should ban you now because you're deliberately wasting everyone's bandwidth.  I don't care what you might have been once now you're nothing but a faker and a scammer.

Let me just say a little bit about fakes. The standard procedure is to tag a torrent bad and then have the whole account taken out. It is only because of the benefit of doubt that your account that you say we are censoring is still here.

So fair warning for the downloaders, better leave this torrent and hop on another one. This guy seems to have gone nuts.
o_O  did not anticipate soap opera.  I would be upset about losing a skull too.  Please seed it tho - for us, for humanity!

"How can i waste bandwidth when you pull 0kbs"

It's not your bandwidth you're wasting, it's that of everyone who has tried to download this torrent.  Over 400 people have downloaded 263MB each so far, many of them have uploaded as much if not more.  

None of them have hurt you in any way but they're all left with just 98.3% of a RAR file they're never going to be able to open because of your pigheadedness.
Insulting a dead man, way to be..... Do a quick search, he killed himself last night cuz of this site...

So I hope your porn needs were worth a human life here. Really shallow way of thinking. Can't jerk off, oh poor poor pathetic you. I wantz free pornz and will continue to mouth until i get off..... Good luck with that. Kinda hard for a dead guy to seed torrents now isn't it?

tolek1973 at 2013-01-16 08:52 CET:
o_O did not anticipate soap opera. I would be upset about losing a skull too. Please seed it tho - for us, for humanity!


That skull meant so much to him, he took his own life last night cuz of them taking it away. I'm guessing terms like "shut the fuck up", "get fucked", "get a job" etc all in the IRC chat was totally worth it. Really descent fella, worked his ass off for absolutely nothing. All he was looking for was acceptance and you killed that..... I have a hard time now believing that our governments and such are the problem any more.....

I love the drama; you furiously typing a scathing letter to internet strangers while the wife of your best friends sobs behind you. Him conveniently forwarding his accounts so his work can basically continue under a new pseudonym. 

Reminds me of DeviantArt drama; "Stargirlcutie killed herself last week because of you jerks! No, I won't tell you anything about her. She gave her accounts to me, her suspiciously similar substitute." ~Moongirlcutie

I also can't find any suicides listed with the information from the WHOIS of his site. Or any relevant info at all - on a few Canadian news sites.

Well, that was a fun time waster. I was pretending to one of the Hardy Boys!

Thanks and Godspeed!

No he's dead, thats why all these new dudes spoke up and started upping his unfinished products. He was about the only person I've ever seen that specifically built his computer for a website. What a waste. Lot of death triggers were in place for him. Of course you wouldn't hear anything or find anything, ever stop to think he made sure of this? I still say he was murdered myself. But thats opinion without fact... But that Timm Wheeler pedo thats stalking all his friends and using this torrent as a chance to slander his name cuz he owes a 16 year old kid money....I'd much rather be talking about him considering he keeps using this torrent as a reference that hes selling kids somewheres....
